faq.title: Have Questions? We Have Answers
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Zyla.

items.question: What is Zyla?
items.answer: Zyla is an AI-powered instant translation tool that works directly on web pages. With a single click, you can instantly translate any text on the internet, making cross-language communication effortless and accessible for everyone.

items.question: How do I use Zyla?
items.answer: Using Zyla is incredibly simple! Just install our browser extension, then highlight any text on any website and click the translate button. The translation appears instantly, without leaving the page or opening new tabs.

items.question: Is Zyla really free?
items.answer: Yes! Zyla is completely free to use. There are no hidden fees, premium subscriptions, or character limits. We believe in making translation accessible to everyone, everywhere, with no barriers.

items.question: Which languages does Zyla support?
items.answer: Zyla supports over 100 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Korean, Turkish, and many more. We are constantly adding new languages to make global communication even easier.

items.question: How fast is the translation?
items.answer: Lightning fast! Zyla provides instant translations in milliseconds. No waiting, no loading screensâ€”just highlight and translate. Perfect for real-time conversations, reading foreign content, or working with international teams.

items.question: Is my data safe with Zyla?
items.answer: Absolutely! Zyla takes privacy seriously. We do not store your translations, track your browsing habits, or share any data with third parties. All translations happen locally in your browser for maximum privacy and security.

items.question: How do I install the Zyla extension?
items.answer: Installation is quick and easy! Visit our website, click the 'Get Extension' button, and follow the Chrome browser prompts. Zyla currently supports only the Chrome browser. The extension is lightweight and does not slow down your browsing experience.

items.question: Can I use Zyla offline?
items.answer: Currently, Zyla does not support offline translations because it requires an internet connection to access our AI translation models. We are working on offline capabilities for popular languages. Stay tuned for updates!

items.question: Does Zyla work on mobile devices?
items.answer: Zyla is primarily designed for desktop browsers, but we are developing mobile apps for iOS and Android. In the meantime, you can use Zyla in mobile browsers, though the experience is optimized for desktop use.

items.question: How accurate are the translations?
items.answer: Zyla delivers highly accurate translations using state-of-the-art AI models. However, depending on context and language complexity, some nuances may occasionally be lost.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We collect almost no data. Your privacy is protected by design.

importantNotice.title: Privacy by Design
importantNotice.content: Zyla is built with privacy as a core principle. We collect almost no data, use no tracking, and our open source code provides full transparency. Your translations remain confidential.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Privacy is our top priority at Zyla. As an open source translation tool, we are committed to transparency and minimal data collection. This Privacy Policy explains our simple approach to data processing.

subsections.subtitle: Open Source Transparency
subsections.text: Our source code is publicly available on GitHub. You can review how we process data for complete transparency in our privacy practices.

subsections.subtitle: No Personal Data Collection
subsections.text: Zyla does not collect, store, or process any personal information. You can use our service completely anonymously.

sections.title: What Data Do We Collect?
sections.content: We collect almost no data. Our service is designed to be as privacy-focused as possible.

subsections.subtitle: Translation Processing
subsections.text: Texts you submit for translation are processed in real time by third-party AI services and immediately discarded. We do not store your translations.

subsections.subtitle: Minimal Technical Data
subsections.text: Basic technical information (IP address, browser type) may be temporarily logged for debugging and performance monitoring for up to 30 days.

subsections.subtitle: No Cookies or Tracking
subsections.text: We do not use cookies, tracking pixels, web beacons, or any other tracking technologies. Browsing history or usage patterns are not collected.

subsections.subtitle: No User Accounts
subsections.text: Zyla does not require registration, accounts, or any user identity. You remain completely anonymous.

sections.title: How Do We Use Data?
sections.content: Any data we process temporarily is used only to provide translation services and basic service maintenance.

subsections.subtitle: Service Operation
subsections.text: Technical logs help us identify errors, optimize performance, and ensure the service works smoothly for all users.

subsections.subtitle: No Marketing or Sales
subsections.text: We do not use data for marketing, advertising, or any commercial purpose. We do not sell or share data with third parties.

subsections.subtitle: Open Source Development
subsections.text: As an open source project, we may share anonymized technical information with contributors to help improve the service.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not share your data with third parties, except in very limited cases required by law.

subsections.subtitle: Third-Party AI Services
subsections.text: Translation requests are processed by external AI providers. Your text is temporarily sent to these services and not stored by us.

subsections.subtitle: Legal Requirements Only
subsections.text: We may disclose information if legally required, such as by court order, subpoena, or government request. This is extremely rare.

subsections.subtitle: No Voluntary Sharing
subsections.text: We do not voluntarily share, sell, rent, or trade data with third parties for any purpose.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: Security is part of our design. Because we collect minimal data, the risk of privacy breaches is very low.

subsections.subtitle: Data Minimization
subsections.text: By collecting almost no data, we eliminate most privacy risks. Translation data is processed and immediately discarded.

subsections.subtitle: Open Source Security
subsections.text: Our code is publicly auditable. Security researchers and the community can identify and fix potential vulnerabilities.

subsections.subtitle: HTTPS Encryption
subsections.text: All communication with our service is protected in transit using HTTPS encryption.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain data for the minimum necessary period and delete it automatically.

subsections.subtitle: Translation Data
subsections.text: Texts submitted for translation are processed in real time and immediately deleted. No translations are stored.

subsections.subtitle: Technical Logs
subsections.text: Temporary technical logs, if any, are automatically deleted within 30 days.

subsections.subtitle: No Long-Term Storage
subsections.text: We do not store user data, profiles, or historical information in databases.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: Because we collect almost no personal data, most traditional privacy rights concerns do not apply to Zyla.

subsections.subtitle: Transparency
subsections.text: Our open source code lets you see exactly how we process any data. There are no hidden data collection practices.

subsections.subtitle: Control
subsections.text: You have full control over your data. To stop any data processing, simply stop using the service.

subsections.subtitle: No Data to Delete
subsections.text: Since we do not store personal data, there is no need for data deletion requests.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: Have questions about privacy? We are transparent about our practices and ready to help.

subsections.subtitle: Privacy Questions
subsections.text: For any privacy-related questions, email us at privacy@getzyla.xyz. We respond to all inquiries within 48 hours.

subsections.subtitle: GitHub Repository
subsections.text: As an open source project, you can also reach us and join discussions via our GitHub repository.

subsections.subtitle: Community
subsections.text: Join our community discussions on GitHub to learn more about our privacy practices.
